DOC.brief_summary: The purpose long-terms study evaluate safety , tolerability , analgesic efficacy EN3409 subject moderate severe chronic pain require continuous around-the-clock opioid analgesia extend period time .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Open-Label Safety Study Evaluate EN3409
DOC.criteria: Female subject practice abstinence use medically acceptable form contraception postmenopausal , biologically sterile , surgically sterile 1 year Male subject practice abstinence , surgically sterile , use medically acceptable form contraception De Novo subject clinical diagnosis moderate severe noncancerrelated CP ( eg , CLBP , OA , neuropathic pain ) ≥ 3 month De Novo subject treat CP stable daily maintenance dose ATC opioid analgesic medication equivalent ≥ 60 mg ≤ 160 mg Morphine Sulfate Equivalent ( MSE ) per day ≥ 4 week Stable health , determine Principal Investigator Subject willing able comply protocol require visit assessment Rollover subject complete 12week Doubleblind Treatment Phase EN3409307/308 clinical study A history current evidence clinically significant disorder condition , opinion investigator , would jeopardize safety subject impact validity study result Females pregnant , breastfeeding , plan become pregnant study Current cancerrelated pain receive chemotherapy within 6 month screen Subjects receive opioid analgesic medication < 60 mg MSE per day within 28 day screen De novo subject receive opioid analgesic medication dose > 160 mg MSE per day within 28 day screen Subjects history chronic painful condition , index CP condition , require frequent analgesic medication Reflex sympathetic dystrophy causalgia ( complex regional pain syndrome ) , acute spinal cord compression , cauda equina compression , acute nerve root compression , meningitis , discitis History allergy contraindication opioid acetaminophen Surgical procedure relief pain within 6 month , nerve/plexus block within 28 day screen Hypokalemia clinically unstable cardiac disease Moderate severe hepatic impairment Moderate severe renal impairment Current past history alcohol substance Positive urine toxicology screen drug abuse History abnormality physical exam , vital sign , ECG , lab value
